Control Name: Ensure 'Secure transfer required' is Enabled
Ensure default network access rule is set to deny
Ensure Storage logging is enabled for Queue service
Ensure Storage logging is enabled for Blob service
Ensure Storage logging is enabled for Table service
Ensure storage account access keys are periodically regenerated
Ensure soft delete is enabled for Azure Storage
Ensure storage encryption is enabled for all storage accounts
Ensure that auditing is enabled for SQL servers
Ensure that TDE is enabled for SQL databases
Ensure that Azure AD admin is configured for SQL servers
Ensure SQL server firewall rules don't allow 0.0.0.0/0
Ensure Advanced Threat Protection is enabled
Ensure Activity Log retention is at least 365 days
Ensure diagnostic settings capture all activity categories
Ensure storage account logging is enabled for read requests
Ensure storage account logging is enabled for write requests
Ensure storage account logging is enabled for delete requests
Ensure that NSGs are applied to all subnets
Ensure NSG flow logs are enabled and sent to Log Analytics
Ensure no SQL Databases allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0
Ensure no Network Security Groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22
Ensure no Network Security Groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 3389
Ensure Network Watcher is enabled
Ensure Virtual Machines are utilizing Managed Disks
Ensure that OS and Data disks are encrypted
Ensure that Unattached disks are encrypted
Ensure that endpoint protection is installed on VMs
Ensure that expiration date is set for all Keys in Key Vault
Ensure that expiration date is set for all Secrets in Key Vault
Ensure that expiration date is set for all Certificates in Key Vault
Ensure that Soft Delete is Enabled for all Key Vaults
Ensure that Purge Protection is Enabled for all Key Vaults
Ensure Key Vault is recoverable
Notes: Both soft delete and purge protection

Control Name: Ensure Key Vault logging is enabled
Notes: Check diagnostic settings for Key Vaults

Control Name: Ensure App Service authentication is set up
Ensure HTTPS only is enabled for App Services
Ensure TLS version is set to 1.2 for App Services
Ensure client certificates are enabled for App Services
Ensure managed identity is enabled for App Services
